entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:52 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:52 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
